bill.title: Qualified Target Industry Tax Refund Program [WPSC]
bill.description: Provides legislative findings and declarations for the tax refund program for qualified target industry businesses. Establishes a schedule for the OTTED to review and revise the list of target industries and submit a report to the Governor and Legislature. Revises the criteria for the OTTED and Enterprise Florida, Inc., to use in identifying target industries. Redesignates the economic-stimulus exemption as the "economic recovery extension," etc.
